title: It
stars: Bill Skarsgård, Jaeden Lieberher, Finn Wolfhard
moviePlot: A group of bullied kids band together when a monster, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

title: Home Again
stars: Nat Wolff, Reese Witherspoon, Lake Bell
moviePlot: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

title: La fille inconnue
stars: Adéle Haenel, Olivier Bonnaud, Jérémie Renier
moviePlot: A woman gets obsessed with the case of a dead woman after learning that the woman had died shortly after having rung her door for help.
